lenders.name: Together Money
lenders.description: Together Money is an award-winning lender with over 45 years of experience in offering mortgages and secured loan products to individuals and businesses.

lenders.name: LandlordInvest: Your Premier Property Finance Marketplace
lenders.description: LandlordInvest is a Patron member of the NACFB and a fully FCA authorised and regulated marketplace lending platform, funded by both private lenders and institutions.

lenders.name: Hilltop Credit Partners
lenders.description: Hilltop Credit Partners provides tailored financing solutions to help developers scale their projects and grow their businesses.

lenders.name: Bibby Financial Services
lenders.description: Bibby Financial Services is a leading finance invoice specialist and trusted provider of cash flow funding solutions to more than 7,800 businesses in the UK.

lenders.name: Charterbank Capital
lenders.description: Charterbank Capital specialises in short-term property finance and operates throughout the southern half of the UK.

lenders.name: Cynergy Bank
lenders.description: Cynergy Bank provides a range of products and services to help customers manage their professional and personal financial requirements.

lenders.name: MT Finance
lenders.description: MT Finance specialises in property finance and providing short-term loans, including bridging loans and auction finance.

lenders.name: Acuity Finance
lenders.description: Acuity Finance offers invoice finance and secured business loans to help small and medium-sized businesses tackle their cash flow challenges.

lenders.name: Hope Capital
lenders.description: Hope Capital is a specialist bridging lender with expert knowledge of the property and finance markets.

lenders.name: CrowdProperty
lenders.description: CrowdProperty is a specialist peer-to-peer lender that provides quick and easy finance to property professionals.

lenders.name: Unbranded Finance
lenders.description: Unbranded Finance is a principal provider of rapid short-term finance solutions for businesses and property investors secured against any type of property throughout the United Kingdom.

lenders.name: The Sancus Group
lenders.description: The Sancus Group offers borrowers fast access to bridging and development property finance and secured asset-backed loans.

lenders.name: Interbridge Finance
lenders.description: Interbridge is a short-term property lender that provides non-regulated loans secured against residential property.
